import React, {useState} from 'react'; import bgImage from './images/bg-image.png'; import retained from './images/retained.png'; import sold from './images/sold.png'; import Select from 'react-select'; import './App.css'; function Player(props) { let [player, setPlayer] = useState(props.item); this.handlePriceChange = this.handlePriceChange.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); return (
{player.isExternalPlayer === 'TRUE' ?
Associated with Other MN Cricket League(s)
: ''}
Base Price : {player.basePrice}
{player.name}
Rank: {player.overallRank} MTBC Team: {player.mtbcTeamName}
{player.mtplTeamName ? MTPL Team: {player.mtplTeamName} :
{ let player = this.state.player; player.purchasePrice = event.target.value; setPlayer(player); }}/>/>
